item.title: Lunch meetings for business at the Jumeirah at Etihad Towers
item.description:
As summer approaches, Jumeirah at Etihad Towers in Abu Dhabi is launching two new business lunch deals. Quest Quest, situated on the 63rd floor, is the highest restaurant in Abu Dhabi. It presents a three-course business lunch, crafted by an award-winning chef, from Sunday to Thursday, 12 pm to 3:30 pm. Priced at AED 145, it includes a complimentary glass of wine and coffee. Scott’s Scott’s, a renowned seafood restaurant, offers a specialized business lunch menu...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/lunch-meetings-for-business-at-the-jumeirah-at-etihad-towers/
